Text.val: 17.03.2014 GB SCR18745 Replaced the INVS_FULLAMOUNT by the INVS_CERTIFIEDAMOUNT
14.03.2014 JH SCR18745 Formatted the screen to the maximal size

ExpSyntax.val: Trim({0,9})&' left join '&Trim({32768,9})&'/BPIV b on b.BPIV_BTCH_ID = INVS_BPIV_BTCH_ID and b.BPIV_BTCP_LINENO = INVS_BPIV_BTCP_LINENO and b.BPIV_BTPC_LINENO = INVS_BPIV_BTPC_LINENO and b.BPIV_LINENO = INVS_BPIV_LINENO left join '&Trim({32768,9})&'/BTCP c on c.BTCP_BTCH_ID = INVS_BPIV_BTCH_ID and c.BTCP_LINENO = INVS_BPIV_BTCP_LINENO'
Trim({32768,9})&'/INVS join '&Trim({32768,9})&'/INVO on INVO_NO = INVS_INVO_NO left join '&Trim({32768,9})&'/CLNA on CLNA_ID = INVS_CLNA_ID'

Trim({32768,9})&'/INVS join '&Trim({32768,9})&'/BPIV a on a.BPIV_INVO_NO = INVS_INVO_NO join '&Trim({32768,9})&'/INVO on INVO_NO = INVS_INVO_NO left join '&Trim({32768,9})&'/CLNA on CLNA_ID = INVS_CLNA_ID'

'a.BPIV_DEBC_NO = '&Trim(Str({0,5},'9'))&' and a.BPIV_INVO_INVOICENO <> '&ASCIIChr(39)&ASCIIChr(39)&' and a.BPIV_INVOICETYPE <> 2 and not(a.BPIV_BTCH_BATCHCODE = '&ASCIIChr(39)&{0,8}&ASCIIChr(39)&' and a.BPIV_BTPC_LINENO = 2)'
'INVO_ADMNO = '&Trim(Str({0,2},'4'))&' and INVO_CLNTNO = '&Trim(Str({0,3},'5'))&' and INVO_DEBH_NO = '&Trim(Str({0,4},'9'))&' and INVO_AACTUALI<>0'

SQL_STMT_U.val: select INVO_INVOICENO, INVS_FINANCEDATE, INVS_CERTIFIEDAMOUNT, CLNA_REQAMOUNT, CLNA_IBAN, INVS_FINALPAYMENTDATE, INVS_EXPECTEDPAYMENTDATE, b.BPIV_AMOUNTCURRH, b.BPIV_AMOUNTSPECIALCURRC, c.BTCP_AMOUNTCURRH from :1 where :2 order by :3

select INVO_INVOICENO, INVS_FINANCEDATE, INVS_CERTIFIEDAMOUNT, CLNA_REQAMOUNT, CLNA_IBAN, INVS_FINALPAYMENTDATE, INVS_EXPECTEDPAYMENTDATE, b.BPIV_AMOUNTCURRH, b.BPIV_AMOUNTSPECIALCURRC, c.BTCP_AMOUNTCURRH from :1 where :2 order by :3

ExpSyntax.val: 'Invoice number'&';'&'Invoice date'&';'&'Invoice amount'&';'&'Total amount paid to supplier'&';'&'Account number'&';'&'Final Payment Date'&';'&'Original Payment Date'&';'&'Amount that was repaid'&';'&'Total Amount invoice repaid'
